name: Timelapse Flight | Manchester to Southampton | Flybe DHC8-Q400
description:
A timelapse flight video with Flybe onboard a Bombardier DHC8-Q400 operating flight BE862 from Manchester to Southampton on 31 December 2015.

***PLEASE SUBSCRIBE, LIKE, COMMENT, AND FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE+ AND INSTAGRAM!!***

The flight takes place on a beautiful clear New Years' Eve morning.  After taxying out to runway 23L at Manchester we depart to the south, enjoying clear views of England for the entire duration of the flight.  We get  a spectacular view of the South Downs on approach to Southampton, where we land on runway 20.

Airline:  Flybe
Flight:  BE862
Aircraft:  Bombardier DHC8-Q400 G-ECOE
From:  Manchester (MAN)
To:  Southampton (SOU)
Departure:  08:56
Arrival:  09:36
Flight Time:  00:40
Seat:  7D
Flight Path: http://goo.gl/XL2kjw

Filmed from seat 7D.


✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
